abstract: A look at the day's news across India from the country's press.
snippet: A look at the day's news across India from the country's press.
lead_paragraph: Economists and policy makers predict the Reserve Bank of India "may choose to hold back from raising policy rates further" when it meets Tuesday to review monetary policy, given the weakening investment climate (Financial Express). The consensus among analysts is toward a shift in stance by the central bank, with a growing emphasis on the "downside risks to growth" (Business Standard).

headline.main: Newswallah: In the English-Language Press Tuesday
